channel.title: Laissez Un Faire Turbo - Game Over
channel.description:
**Gamers Are Oppressed, And Aren't Allowed To Host Games Inside Of Other Games Any More**
![image|585x500](upload://2j5TDesvNvFr7yU135wcvmgWxR6.png)
Can we get an F in the chat. Can we also get 5 /ins in the chat for this Epic(TM) Blood on the Clocktower game.
Day length - As long as I feel like. Night length- As long as I feel like, shorter than 5 minutes.
1. An_gorta_Pratai 2. Wazza 3. Marluxion 4. GGhana 5.

instead they deadass just claimed it

item.title: Laissez Un Faire Turbo - Game Over
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
amnesiac is like
it’s a Claim that people really like making in LuF because you can pretend that your ability is really arcane and impossible to guess and then you like
basically don’t have to claim anything people can call you on

it’s also not really that good of a fakeclaim

Read full topic
